DOC.brief_summary: The study is to evaluate the effect of amrubicin (AMR) compared to docetaxel (DOC) in the treatment of non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC).
DOC.brief_title: Amrubicin (AMR) Trial in Patients With Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histological or cytological diagnosis of nonsmall cell lung cancer (NSCLC) 1 or 2 prior chemotherapy regimen including 1 platinumbased chemotherapy 20 or older but younger than 75 years of age Symptomatic brain metastasis Interstitial pneumonia or pulmonary fibrosis Abnormal cardiac function or myocardial infraction within 6 months before study enrollment Active infection
